p: The yields of M fruticosa serpyllifolia VOs in the current study were lower than that the findings of a study conducted in Palestine studied by Shehab et al., [ 24] which reported a yield of VOs of 2.2%. Also our data were lower in yield than that of M fruticosa serpyllifolia growing in Turkey examined by Gulluce et al., [ 28] who reported a yield of 1.85% of VOs of the plant collected in the flowering period.
